T02D2939:9b-0: @9b # // 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi
T02D2939:9b-1: cho ga / chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la rab
T02D2939:9b-2: gnas kyang // thugs rjes gtan du mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
T02D2939:9b-3: 'dod pa'i don grub mtha' yas gzugs mnga' ba //
T02D2939:9b-4: dpa' brtan rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2939:9b-5: de la dang por bum pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2939:9b-6: nor bu yungs kar d'ur ba dang //
T02D2939:9b-7: rin chen rma med tsandan bcas //
T02D2939:9b-8: shel dang rdo rje'i me tog dang //
T02D2939:9b-9: chu yi gser ram yang na ni //
T02D2939:10a-2: gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri zhing dgang //
T02D2939:10a-4: gser ram dngul lam zangs las byas kyang rung /
T02D2939:10a-5: zhabs kyi gdub kor ni 'phang du sor gcig gi tshad du byas la gdags so //
T02D2939:10a-6: dbus kyi dbyibs ni lhung bzed 'dra bar bya'o //
T02D2939:10a-7: mgrin pa'i 'phang du so bzhi'i tshad du bya'o //
T02D2939:10a-8: mgrin pa'i nang gi tshad kyang sor bzhi pa'i spubs su bya'o //
T02D2939:10a-9: mgrin pa'i kha khyer phyir skyed pa ni sor gnyis kyi tshad du byas la /
T02D2939:10a-10: kha'i cha ga'i bshal ka sor gcig gi tshad du bya'o //
T02D2939:10a-11: dbul po rnams kyis dngul dang gser dang zangs la
T02D2939:10a-12: sogs pa las bya ba mi rnyed pas de'i phyir
T02D2939:10a-13: rgyu gzhan las bya bar gsungs te /
T02D2939:10a-14: bum pa padma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar zhing byi
T02D2939:10a-15: ru dang li khri dang mtshal gyi mdog ltar dmar
T02D2939:10a-16: ba dang / so btang nyes pa'i nag po ra ri med par bya'o //
T02D2939:10a-17: ltor ni chu phul lnga yan chod nas bcu shong ba'i tshad gar nus pa'i tshad byas te /
T02D2939:10a-18: de nas lag pa byug spos kyis byugs te /
T02D2939:10a-19: dri zhim po shin tu bkra shis pa'i bdug pas bdugs la /
T02D2939:10a-21: aom ma mri te h'um phat ces bdud rtsi thab
T02D2939:10a-22: sbyor gyi sngags kyis lan bdun du bzlas pas bum
T02D2939:10a-24: chu gtsang ma srog chags med par btsags pas bkang ste /
T02D2939:10a-25: de'i nang du tsandan dang ga pur dang /
T02D2939:10a-26: gur kum dang dz'a ti dang /
T02D2939:10a-27: gla rtsi lnga po bsres pa'i chu yang blugs nas
T02D2939:10a-28: der rin po che lnga zhes bya ba nor bu
T02D2939:10a-34: sman lnga zhes bya ba bya kri dang /
T02D2939:10a-39: 'bru lnga zhes bya ba nas dang /
T02D2939:10a-43: mon sran gre 'u rnams kyang bcug la bum pa'i
T02D2939:10a-44: khar gser ram dngul phor ram khar phor gtsang ma'i
T02D2939:10a-45: nang du yungs kar blugs pa'i snod bzhag ste /
T02D2939:10a-46: ras gtsang ma kha tshar ma god pas bum pa'i
T02D2939:10a-47: kha dang yungs kar gyi snod dang bcas pa dkri
T02D2939:10a-49: mdud pa'i steng du ba'i lci bas rgyas gdab pa'i
T02D2939:10a-50: tshul du glan la der rtsva d'ur ba'i nyag ma
T02D2939:10b-0: bdun btsugs te phyag na rdo rje la dbul @10b
T02D2939:10b-1: bar 'os pa'i me tog dmar po dri zhim po'am
T02D2939:10b-2: / yang na me tog dri zhim po gang yang
T02D2939:10b-3: rung ba'i phreng bas kyang bum pa'i mgrin pa bskor
T02D2939:10b-4: / ba'i don no // dkyil 'khor med par bum
T02D2939:10b-5: pa 'ba' zhig gis 'dod pa'i las mi 'grub pas
T02D2939:10b-6: thog mar dkyil 'khor bri nas brtag dgos pas /
T02D2939:10b-7: spyi rgyud dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las 'dir sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D2939:10b-8: phyugs lhas shing gcig lha yi khang pa'am //
T02D2939:10b-9: lam gyi bzhi mdo'am khang stong nags tshal du //
T02D2939:10b-11: dkyil 'khor bri bar bstan pa yang de nyid las //
T02D2939:10b-12: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa khru bzhi'i tshad ;
T02D2939:10b-13: / tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bri //
T02D2939:10b-14: phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su gzung //
T02D2939:10b-15: sgo bzhi ba la phyogs kyi rtsa yang dgram //
T02D2939:10b-17: de yang sa gzhi shin tu sbyangs shin tu 'thas
T02D2939:10b-18: par bcags pa la ba'i rnam lnga zhes bya ba
T02D2939:10b-24: spos rnams bsres pa rnams kyis bskus la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2939:10b-25: khru bzhi'i tshad la gru bzhi par byas la phur bus legs par gdab bo //
T02D2939:10b-26: de'i dbus su gsang sngags 'chang khrus byed pa'i sa khru do gzhag go //
T02D2939:10b-27: de'i phyi rim khru gang gi khyon yod pa la cha gsum du bgos te /
T02D2939:10b-28: dang por 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi gnas su bya'o //
T02D2939:10b-29: gnyis ba ni sgo khyud dang mu khyud mu tig gi phreng ba dag bri'o //
T02D2939:10b-30: gsum pa la ni mchod pa dag bri'o //
T02D2939:10b-31: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dgod pa yang /
T02D2939:10b-32: spyi'i rgyud gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las /
T02D2939:10b-34: brgya byin gyi ni rdo rjer gsungs //
T02D2939:10b-35: me lha'i phyag rgya me thab yin //
T02D2939:10b-36: gshin rje'i phyag rgya be con te //
T02D2939:10b-37: bden bral gyi ni ral grir bstan //
T02D2939:10b-38: chu bdag gi ni zhags par bstan //
T02D2939:10b-39: rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin //
T02D2939:10b-40: ku ber yi dbyugs to yi yin //
T02D2939:10b-41: dbang phyug gi ni rtse gsum gsungs ;
T02D2939:10b-42: / sa yi phyag rgya bum pa yin //
T02D2939:10b-43: nyi zla'i phyag rgya zlum por bya //
T02D2939:10b-45: dkyil 'khor ni sgo bzhir btod cing /
T02D2939:10b-46: bkra shis brgyad po dpal be'u dang /
T02D2939:11a-2: dbus su ni ku sha bting zhing phyi rol thog tu yang ku sha dgram mo //
T02D2939:11a-3: steng du yang bla res legs par dag ba cing me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2939:11a-6: me long gis brgyan na khrus kyi cho ga bkra shis par 'gyur ro //
T02D2939:11a-7: de nas bum pa yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste /
T02D2939:11a-8: grva bzhir seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la bdud
T02D2939:11a-9: rtsi thab sgyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa bzlas
T02D2939:11a-10: shing btsugs nas / tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la
T02D2939:11a-11: yang gsang sngags de nyid bzlas shing bskor bas mtshams
T02D2939:11a-12: shing btsugs nas / gcad par bya'o // bshos dang gtor ma bkod pa yang /
T02D2939:11a-13: dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2939:11a-14: bza' dang sha chang la phug la sogs bcas //
T02D2939:11a-15: 'bras chan 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2939:11a-17: ma phye ba yang 'os 'os su phye ste /
T02D2939:11a-18: sha chang la phug dag ni gshin rje dang bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin no ;
T02D2939:11a-19: / de nas rig sngags 'chang bdag nyid phyi nang gi dri ma dag par byas la /
T02D2939:11a-21: cho ga brtsams pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2939:11a-22: des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yis //
T02D2939:11a-23: mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya //
T02D2939:11a-24: gang dag yid dge sems dangs shing //
T02D2939:11a-25: gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D2939:11a-26: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba //
T02D2939:11a-27: mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na //
T02D2939:11a-29: de'i don ni rang gi rgyud dag par byed de dkyil 'khor gyi nub sgor 'greng la /
T02D2939:11a-30: lag pa byug spos kyis byugs nas /
T02D2939:11a-31: rang gi lha ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du bsgoms la /
T02D2939:11a-32: mig gnyis su yi ge h'um 'bar ba re bsams la se gol gyi sgra phyung zhing /
T02D2939:11a-33: phyogs su bltas pas mtshams bcad bgegs bskrad nas /
T02D2939:11a-34: slar stan bde ba la 'dug nas dkyil 'khor de
T02D2939:11a-35: yang rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i lha'i
T02D2939:11a-36: gnas bzang po dpe med par dmigs shing /
T02D2939:11a-37: bum pa de yang yid bzhin gyi rgya mtsho'i bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar dmigs te /
T02D2939:11a-38: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las /
T02D2939:11a-39: kha phye ste padma'i tshul du byas pa ni padma'i gdan gyi phyag rgya yin te /
T02D2939:11a-41: aom padma kam la ye sv'ah'a zhes brjod nas yid
T02D2939:11a-42: bzhin gyi mtsho'i dbus su padma'i sdong po dang lo
T02D2939:11b-0: ma dang 'dab ma @11b dang ze ba dang /
T02D2939:11b-1: snying por bcas pa dpe med par bzang zhing che ba gcig bsams te /
T02D2939:11b-2: mchod yon gyi snod blangs la sgreng zhing 'di skad du /
T02D2939:11b-3: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
T02D2939:11b-4: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2939:11b-5: bdag gi mchod yon bzhes su gsol //
T02D2939:11b-6: mchod yon pa zhes nas de nyid du //
T02D2939:11b-7: mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D2939:11b-8: a'a ha ra a'a ha ra /
T02D2939:11b-9: sarba bidya dhar p'u dzi te sv'a h'a zhes brjod
T02D2939:11b-10: pas 'phags pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la 'khor dang
T02D2939:11b-11: bcas pa gshegs par rig pa dang /
T02D2939:11b-13: aa mri tas bsang yang na rtsa sngags sam bskrad sngags kyis so //
T02D2939:11b-14: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe bong gis mnan te /
T02D2939:11b-15: lhag ma gsum nas do tsam gyis ma reg bar byas te //
T02D2939:11b-16: rdo rje'i tshul du byas nas bstan pa ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yin te /
T02D2939:11b-18: aom sham ka re ma h'a sa ma ye sv'ah'a zhes brjod nas /
T02D2939:11b-19: gdan de la 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po phyag
T02D2939:11b-20: na rdo rje'i thugs kyi khyad par las byung ba
T02D2939:11b-21: / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba mdog sngon po yid tsam khro ba /
T02D2939:11b-22: phyag g-yas na rdo rje rgya gram las rva phyogs gcig med pa bsams pa /
T02D2939:11b-23: phyag g-yon pa dkur brten cing 'gying ba /
T02D2939:11b-25: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2939:11b-26: na bza' stod g-yogs dar la smad g-yogs tshi gu can mnabs pa /
T02D2939:11b-27: 'khor rigs kyi lha dpag tu med pa dang gshegs par dmigs shing /
T02D2939:11b-28: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya lag pa gnyis thal ma khong
T02D2939:11b-29: stong du spyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug
T02D2939:11b-30: ste / phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo mthe bong
T02D2939:11b-31: dang mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad 'byung bar byas
T02D2939:11b-32: ste / la / gung mo gshibs phyi rol nas
T02D2939:11b-33: mdzub mo bkug la nas gang tsam gyis ma reg
T02D2939:11b-34: ste / la / par byas te / mthe bong
T02D2939:11b-35: gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gshibs pa ni rdo
T02D2939:11b-36: rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las
T02D2939:11b-39: aom badzra dzva l'an l'a ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:11b-40: de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga rim bzhin du dbul ba ni /
T02D2939:11b-41: dang por byug spos dbu la te /
T02D2939:11b-42: gtsang zhing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi //
T02D2939:11b-43: lha rdzas bzang po'i byug spos 'di //
T02D2939:12a-2: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D2939:12a-3: a'a ha ra a'a ha ra sarba bidya dha ra p'u dzi te sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12a-4: de nas me tog dbul te /
T02D2939:12a-5: gtsang zhing gtsang mar skyes pa yi //
T02D2939:12a-6: lha rdzas dam pa'i me tog 'di //
T02D2939:12a-7: bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
T02D2939:12a-8: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D2939:12a-9: de nas bdug pa dbul te /
T02D2939:12a-10: shing gi khu ba yid du 'ong //
T02D2939:12a-11: dri yis rgyas pa bdug pa'i mchog / bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
T02D2939:12a-12: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D2939:12a-14: sman rnams khu ba yi gar 'ong //
T02D2939:12a-15: dri yis rgyas pa lha yi zas //
T02D2939:12a-16: bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
T02D2939:12a-17: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D2939:12a-18: 'di yan chad kyi sngags ni gong mar smos pa gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02D2939:12a-19: de'i 'og tu mar me dbul te /
T02D2939:12a-20: gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis la //
T02D2939:12a-21: dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba ;
T02D2939:12a-22: / lha rdzas bzang po'i zhun mar 'di //
T02D2939:12a-23: bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
T02D2939:12a-24: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D2939:12a-25: a'a lo ka a'a lo ka sarba bidya dha ra p'u dzi te sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12a-26: de nas gdon rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya ste //
T02D2939:12a-27: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02D2939:12a-28: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02D2939:12a-29: dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02D2939:12a-30: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02D2939:12a-31: bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su //
T02D2939:12a-32: thal sbyar de dag la ni gsol ba 'debs //
T02D2939:12a-33: bu smad bcas shing g-yog 'khor bcas pa rnams ;
T02D2939:12a-34: / gsan nas pan gdags slad du 'dir gshegs shig
T02D2939:12a-35: / sems can gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang
T02D2939:12a-36: // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yul gang gnas dang //
T02D2939:12a-37: gang dag shar nub nyi ma'i khyim gnas dang //
T02D2939:12a-38: chu bo kun dang chu yi ngogs rnams dang //
T02D2939:12a-39: rin chen gnas su'ang gnas ni bcas pa dang //
T02D2939:12a-40: rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma ltang lteng dang //
T02D2939:12a-41: khron pa dang ni ngam grog chu mig dang //
T02D2939:12a-42: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer nags tshal dang //
T02D2939:12a-43: khong stong dag dang lha yi gnas dag dang //
T02D2939:12a-44: lha khang mchod rten 'dug gnas bsti gnas dang //
T02D2939:12b-0: mu stegs gnas dang glang chen @12b khang pa dang //
T02D2939:12b-1: gang dag rgyal po'i dkor khong gnas pa dang //
T02D2939:12b-2: srang dang khyams dang lam kha'i bzhi mdo dang //
T02D2939:12b-3: gang dag shing gcig po dang lam po che //
T02D2939:12b-4: dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang //
T02D2939:12b-5: gang dag seng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas //
T02D2939:12b-6: 'jigs pa'i sa dang 'brog na gnas pa dang //
T02D2939:12b-7: gling bzang rnams su gnas ni bcas pa dang //
T02D2939:12b-8: gang dag lhun po dur khrod gnas pa rnams //
T02D2939:12b-9: rab tu thugs dgyes dri dang phreng ba dang //
T02D2939:12b-10: bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod gus 'bul //
T02D2939:12b-11: 'di dag bzhes nas bsnams dang gsol mdzod la /
T02D2939:12b-12: bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D2939:12b-13: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las kha phye
T02D2939:12b-14: ste bkan pa ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2939:12b-15: // de'i sngags la srin po rnams la krang ke re /
T02D2939:12b-20: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
T02D2939:12b-22: sarba tatkham aungga te spha ran ai mam ga ga na kham sv'a h'a /
T02D2939:12b-23: de ltar gdon rnams la gtor ma byin nas phyogs
T02D2939:12b-24: skyong rnams la mchod pa lag pa gnyis thal mo
T02D2939:12b-25: khong stong du sbyar ba las /
T02D2939:12b-26: sor mo dbus ma gsum bskyed de /
T02D2939:12b-29: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ru dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2939:12b-30: dbang po'i phyogs su sha kr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2939:12b-31: me'i phyogs su aagna ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12b-32: gshin rje'i phyogs su bepta ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12b-33: bden bral phyogs su raksha sa aa dhi pa ta ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12b-34: chu lha'i phyogs su me ga aa sha n'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12b-35: rlung lha'i phyogs su b'a ya be sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12b-36: ku be ra'i phyogs su yaksha biddha re sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12b-37: steng gi phyogs su aa di ty'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12b-40: 'og gi phyogs su pri thi byee sv'ah'a /
T02D2939:12b-42: de ltar phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod de /
T02D2939:12b-43: bzlas brjod bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2939:12b-44: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam //
T02D2939:12b-45: yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2939:12b-46: rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas su //
T02D2939:12b-47: rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig / ces 'byung
T02D2939:12b-48: ba'i don ni de ltar 'phags pa 'khor dang bcas
T02D2939:12b-49: pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang /
T02D2939:12b-50: 'byung po thams cad la mchod pa byas nas /
T02D2939:13a-0: bum pa'i nang du 'phags pa spyan drangs pa de nyid @13a * //
T02D2939:13a-1: kyang srog dang bcas pa lta bur dmigs te /
T02D2939:13a-2: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med
T02D2939:13a-3: pa la yi ge'i phreng ba rnams bkod de bzlas
T02D2939:13a-6: yi ge'i phreng ba la dus gcig tu dmigs pa
T02D2939:13a-7: ni 'jig rten na za 'og la sogs pa'i gding
T02D2939:13a-8: ba khra bo la lta ba dang 'dra'o //
T02D2939:13a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chung du'i nang du yi ge'i phreng ba mang ba ji ltar bkod cen /
T02D2939:13a-10: sems goms pa rnams la mi rung ba med de /
T02D2939:13a-11: chu nyung du shin tu dang ba'i nang du nyi zla dang /
T02D2939:13a-12: gza' skar la sogs pas brgyan pa'i nam mkha' thams cad snang ba bzhin no //
T02D2939:13a-13: rgyal po zhes pas 'dzin du zad do /
T02D2939:13a-14: gzhan yang khrus kyi sbyor ba bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2939:13a-15: mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2939:13a-16: srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2939:13a-17: mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kun //
T02D2939:13a-18: de dag thams cad zhi bar lta //
T02D2939:13a-20: / sdig pa kun las rnam par thar //
T02D2939:13a-22: de ltar bzlas brjod kyi grangs tshang nas phyogs bcu'i lha rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2939:13a-23: tshigs su bcad pa yang bsgrag par bya ste /
T02D2939:13a-24: dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha /
T02D2939:13a-25: lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2939:13a-26: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13a-27: me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha //
T02D2939:13a-28: 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2939:13a-29: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13a-30: gshin rje be con 'chang ba'i lha //
T02D2939:13a-31: ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2939:13a-32: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13a-33: bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha //
T02D2939:13a-34: srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2939:13a-35: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13a-36: zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha //
T02D2939:13a-37: bden pa gsung ba gdon gyi bdag / nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la //
T02D2939:13a-38: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13a-39: rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha //
T02D2939:13a-40: tshig srung gdon gyi bdag po ste //
T02D2939:13a-41: rlung gi phyogs kyi gdon bcas la //
T02D2939:13a-42: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13b-0: @13b gnod sbyin lag na be con thogs //
T02D2939:13b-1: nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste //
T02D2939:13b-2: byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la //
T02D2939:13b-3: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13b-4: dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha //
T02D2939:13b-5: bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la //
T02D2939:13b-6: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13b-7: 'og gi klu ste sa yi lha //
T02D2939:13b-8: sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste //
T02D2939:13b-9: dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la //
T02D2939:13b-10: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13b-11: steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang //
T02D2939:13b-12: zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang //
T02D2939:13b-13: gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la //
T02D2939:13b-14: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2939:13b-15: de nas shu ti dang ba'i rnam lnga chu dang sbyar ba la /
T02D2939:13b-16: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa btab ste /
T02D2939:13b-17: khrus byed pa'i lus bskus te /
T02D2939:13b-18: dril nas khrus byas te gos sar pa bgos nas /
T02D2939:13b-20: de la srung ba chen po bya'o //
T02D2939:13b-21: de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byin te /
T02D2939:13b-24: cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rtsva
T02D2939:13b-25: ku sha bkram pa'i steng du bde bar 'dug la
T02D2939:13b-26: / gsang sngags zlos pas bum pa blangs te /
T02D2939:13b-27: gzungs sngags bzlas shing khrus byed du bcug la phyi
T02D2939:13b-28: nang gi dri ma thams cad ma lus par dag
T02D2939:13b-29: par bsam mo // shin tu bde legs dang bkra shis dang /
T02D2939:13b-30: rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i tshig dang rol
T02D2939:13b-31: mo'i sgra skad rab tu snyan pa dang yang ldan
T02D2939:13b-39: gi wang rnams kyang slob ma'i nang du ras khri'u bting ba'i nang du bzhag ste /
T02D2939:13b-40: de bkra shis 'don pa'i lag tu bzhag nas rdzas de rnams re re nas blangs shing sbyin no //
T02D2939:13b-41: de nas bya ba bya ste /
T02D2939:13b-42: rma bya'i steng du zla ba'i steng du gzungs sngags bsams la /
T02D2939:13b-43: des bya bcing gzungs ring brjod pa'i gsham la che
T02D2939:13b-44: ge mo'i sarba by'a dhi la sogs pa sbyar ro
T02D2939:13b-45: // de nas bsrung ba bya ste /
T02D2939:13b-46: skud pa la bsrung ba byas la gdags /
T02D2939:13b-47: gzungs ring bris la de la rab gnas byas pa gdags so //
T02D2939:13b-48: de nas yang bsrung ba bya ste /
T02D2939:14a-0: rdo rje phyed de'i lag tu byin nas zhi ba dang dga' @14a * //
T02D2939:14a-1: ba'i sems kyis longs shig ces bya ba'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2939:14a-2: rdo rje phyed po de la bzung nas gdon thams cad las thar nas ldang ste /
T02D2939:14a-3: zla ba sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bzung ba las thar
T02D2939:14a-4: ba bzhin du lus sdig pa dang bral ba'i dbang
T02D2939:14a-5: du mdzad nas / sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas //
T02D2939:14a-6: sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed //
T02D2939:14a-7: rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste //
T02D2939:14a-8: dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan //
T02D2939:14a-9: sems can dbang po nyams pa dang //
T02D2939:14a-10: tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang //
T02D2939:14a-11: phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang //
T02D2939:14a-12: lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang //
T02D2939:14a-13: mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang //
T02D2939:14a-14: bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang //
T02D2939:14a-15: phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang //
T02D2939:14a-16: nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang //
T02D2939:14a-17: mya ngan ngal las gnod pa dang //
T02D2939:14a-18: 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang //
T02D2939:14a-19: gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang //
T02D2939:14a-20: mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang //
T02D2939:14a-21: mya ngan ngal las byung ba yis //
T02D2939:14a-22: rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang //
T02D2939:14a-23: cho ga 'di yi phan yon gyis //
T02D2939:14a-24: de dag las ni thar bar 'gyur //
T02D2939:14a-26: de nas 'byor na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2939:14a-27: yang gzhan du na 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D2939:14a-28: byams pa che dang snying rje che //
T02D2939:14a-29: mnyam par ldan par byas kyang rung //
T02D2939:14a-30: de yang zhi bar shes bya ste //
T02D2939:14a-31: nang gi sbyin sreg dam pa yin //
T02D2939:14a-32: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi
